title: Apple, GameStop, Oracle, and Other Stocks for Investors to Watch This Week
text:
Few major companies report earnings this week. The highlights are GameStop and Zscaler on Tuesday, followed by Broadcom, Oracle, and Kroger on Thursday. Apple also hosts a product event on Tuesday, at which it is expected to unveil its new lineup of iPhones.

The economic data calendar includes several releases related to the U.S. consumer. Out Thursday, the Bureau of Labor Statistics’ Consumer Price Index for August, excluding volatile food and energy components, is expected to have risen 2.3% year-over-year. On Friday, the...
description: Apple announces its lineup of new iPhones, and we’ll see earnings reports from Broadcom and Kroger as well. Economic data focuses on the consumer.
